example: Offenders should be rehabilitated to reduce reoffending.
Victims need legal and psychological support.

meaning: cơ quan thực thi pháp luật
example: Law enforcement maintains public safety.
An investigation collects evidence to identify suspects.
Strong evidence is required to secure a conviction.
A fair trial protects the rights of both sides.
The verdict depends on evidence and legal arguments.
Conviction can have long-lasting consequences.
The judge decides the sentence based on severity.
Imprisonment aims to punish and deter crime.
Deterrence aims to prevent future crimes.
Rehabilitation helps offenders reintegrate.
Parole allows prisoners to return gradually.
Community service can be an alternative to prison.
Fines are common for minor violations.
Juvenile crime relates to family and education.
Violent crime creates fear in communities.
Online fraud has increased with digital payments.
Corruption undermines trust in institutions.
Cybercrime targets data and financial accounts.
